channel.title: Homes on Anqi (Angie) Liu
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Anqi (Angie) Liu

item.description: I am a DOLCIT postdoctoral research associate in Department of Computing and Mathematical Sciences (CMS) at California Institute of Technology (Caltech), working with Prof. Yisong Yue and Prof. Anima Anandkumar. I received the PIMCO postdoctoral fellowship 2019-2020. Before coming to Caltech, I received my Ph.D. in Department of Computer Science, University of Illinois at Chicago (UIC). I was fortunate to have Prof. Brian Ziebart as my advisor. My research interest lies in machine learning and its applications.
